idea: Chalo is engaged in the business of providing technology solutions for public transportation through its suite of mobile applications including but not limited to, ‘Chalo’ mobile application and website www.chalo.com. Chalo offers solutions for multi-modal trip planning, real-time tracking of different modes of public transportation and ticketing which allows commuters to save time, money and effort, making daily travel more convenient.
name: CHALO MOBILITY PRIVATE LIMITED
